title.narrative: Support Program to Respond to Climate Change

description.narrative: The Support Program to Respond to Climate Change initiative contributes to promoting activities by the Government of Vietnam to respond to climate change's impacts and to reduce greenhouse gas emission, including policy dialogue and policy actions in order to ensure the sustainable development of Vietnam's economy, society and environment. The immediate objectives of Australia's engagement in the SP-RCC are to contribute to: support the implementation of climate change-related tasks in Vietnam which are defined in the NTP-RCC, and in the SP-RCC program framework; support the alignment of assistance procedures with GOV's regulations relating to management and utility of ODA; coordinate policy development, technical and financial activities provided by the GOV, the contributing donors, NGOs and private sector to climate change response in Vietnam; and assist GOV with ensuring that climate change is mainstreamed into development policies, programs and planning of sectoral line agencies a
